es.wrong_recipe_selected:
¡Oops! Casi, pero elegiste la receta equivocada.
[color=#C2380E][font_size=35]Perdiste una vida.[/font_size][/color]
es.wrong_ingredientes_collected:
¡Oops! No todos los ingredientes fueron correctos.
[color=#C46A0A][font_size=35]Perdiste 30 segundos.[/font_size][/color]
es.right_recipe_and_ingredientes_collected:
¡Bien hecho! Preparaste la receta correctamente.
[color=#397002][font_size=35]Has ganado 15 segundos.[/font_size][/color]
es.gravitational_recipe:
¡Genial! Capturaste un ingrediente gravitacional.
[color=#3E0A66][font_size=35]Ganaste una vida.[/font_size][/color]

en.wrong_recipe_selected:
Oops! Almost, but you chose the wrong recipe.
[color=#C2380E][font_size=35]You lost a life.[/font_size][/color]
en.wrong_ingredientes_collected:
Oops! Not all ingredients were correct.
[color=#C46A0A][font_size=35]You lost 30 seconds.[/font_size][/color]
en.right_recipe_and_ingredientes_collected:
Well done! You prepared the recipe correctly.
[color=#397002][font_size=35]You gained 15 seconds.[/font_size][/color]
en.gravitational_recipe:
Awesome! You caught a gravitational ingredient.
[color=#3E0A66][font_size=35]You gained one life.[/font_size][/color]

fr.wrong_recipe_selected:
Oups! Presque, mais tu as choisi la mauvaise recette.
[color=#C2380E][font_size=35]Tu as perdu une vie.[/font_size][/color]
fr.wrong_ingredientes_collected:
Oups! Tous les ingrédients n’étaient pas corrects.
[color=#C46A0A][font_size=35]Tu as perdu 30 secondes.[/font_size][/color]
fr.right_recipe_and_ingredientes_collected:
Bien joué ! Tu as préparé la recette correctement.
[color=#397002][font_size=35]Tu as gagné 15 secondes.[/font_size][/color]
fr.gravitational_recipe:
Génial! Tu as attrapé un ingrédient gravitationnel.
[color=#3E0A66][font_size=35]Tu as gagné une vie.[/font_size][/color]
